abstract: Hillary Rodham Clinton said that while “the devil is always in the details” in the negotiations to curtail Iran’s nuclear program, she supported the structure agreed to on Thursday, adding that “diplomacy deserves a chance to succeed.”

headline.main: Saying the ‘Onus Is on Iran,’ Hillary Clinton Calls Nuclear Framework an ‘Important Step’

snippet: Hillary Rodham Clinton said that while “the devil is always in the details” in the negotiations to curtail Iran’s nuclear program, she supported the structure agreed to on Thursday, adding that “diplomacy deserves a chance to succeed.”
